Who is Hendry Khoza?

In a nutshell, Hendry Khoza is a computer engineering student at Tshwane University of Techonology. I chose this field of study because of the opportunities that technology presents to us and I believe when used right it can improve our lives for the better.

Where I shine the most

Where I shine the most

I owe the skills that I have to the tech community online such as freecodecamp and the instructors who took the time to make Udemy courses, with that being said I have the following skills:

  • Web Development - I am comfortable working with javascript/Typescript and Node.js but my favorite language for web is Go. I have experience with react library and Redux

  • Mobile Development - I participated in the MTN App of the Year Awards in September 2020 where I develop android applications using android studio, java, and firebase, this experience made me feel more comfortable contributing to open source android application

  • Linux and scripting language - I have been using Linux on a desktop for 2 years and my favorite tool is the bash terminal. Using Linux made it easy when I started using cloud computing because I was familiar with most of the tools and bash scripting language

  • System Development - I am happy that I got to learn about System Development life cycle when I was at university and the software engineering module took it further were got to learn about agile development.

  • Database Management - I have experience with SQL query language using oracle database and have an understanding of the relation database such as MangoDB
